titulo: Material de Estudio - Ingles - 6ยบ PRIMARIA
introduccion: Repasa este vocabulario de Ingles para ganar en el Rosco.

conceptos.definicion: The layer of gases surrounding the Earth or another planet.
Something done successfully, typically by effort, courage, or skill.
Belonging to a very distant past and no longer in existence.
The way that someone or something looks.
To give a spoken or written account of something.
The variety of plant and animal life in a particular habitat.
A large outdoor board for displaying advertisements.
Unable to breathe easily, for example because you have been running.
The part of a picture or scene that is furthest from the viewer.
A device that measures air pressure and predicts changes in the weather.
A task or situation that tests someone's abilities.
A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common.
The weather conditions prevailing in an area in general or over a long period.
A social gathering or enjoyable activity held to honor an occasion.
A human society with its own social organization and culture.
The action or process of discovering or being discovered.
Sad or displeased because someone or something has failed to fulfill one's hopes.
The process of starting to experience or possess something new (Economic...).
Highly pleasant to the taste.
A situation that is likely to cause harm or injury.
The surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives.
A public display of works of art or items of interest.
Costing a lot of money.
Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
Extremely large; huge.
Extraordinarily good or attractive.
The lowest load-bearing part of a building, typically below ground level.
Happening or doing something often.
A time that is still to come.
To be able to pay for something (can...).
The speed at which someone or something is able to move (not speed). Buscamos: Fast.
All of the people born and living at about the same time.
The study of the physical features of the earth and its atmosphere.
A glass building in which plants are grown that need protection from cold weather.
Very beautiful or attractive.
An idea or opinion that is made about a large group of people (not specific).
Property that is or may be inherited; an inheritance.
Parallel to the plane of the horizon; at right angles to the vertical.
(Of an animal) spend the winter in a dormant state.
(Of a man) good-looking.
Very great in amount or level (not low).
Of great significance or value.
An idea, feeling, or opinion about something or someone.
Impossible to believe; extraordinary.
The action of interrupting or being interrupted.
To use or create something for the first time.
An act of traveling from one place to another.
Feeling or showing envy of someone or their achievements and advantages.
Personal ornaments, such as necklaces, rings, or bracelets.
Just behavior or treatment.
A story or piece of news that is intended to be funny.
A person whose job is to look after a certain place, like a zoo.
Be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information.
The joint between the thigh and the lower leg in humans.
A weapon with a cutting blade and a handle.
The male ruler of an independent state, especially one who inherits the position.
All the visible features of an area of countryside or land.
Written works, especially those considered of superior or lasting artistic merit.
A particular place or position.
The state of great comfort and extravagant living.
To feel or show a strong affection for someone.
Very good, beautiful, or impressive.
A substance made by mixing other substances together.
An act of changing physical location or position.
Something that is difficult or impossible to understand or explain.
A large and impressively beautiful house.
Existing in or caused by nature; not made or caused by humankind.
Required to be done, achieved, or present; essential.
A district where people live, especially in a town or city.
Not in or to any place; not anywhere.
A person whose job is to keep or examine records.
A piece of information or news.
A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
An individual animal, plant, or single-celled life form.
Present or existing from the beginning; first or earliest.
The way a thing turns out; a consequence.
Extending across the whole of a medium or area.
An act of staging or presenting a play, concert, or other form of entertainment.
The presence in or introduction into the environment of a substance that has harmful or poisonous effects.
Having great power, prestige, or influence.
The continuous physical force exerted on or against an object by something in contact with it.
A feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements.
A quality or accomplishment that makes someone suitable for a particular job or activity.
A certain, indeterminate, or specified amount or number of something.
At a fast speed; rapidly.
Making little or no noise.
One of four equal or corresponding parts into which something is or can be divided.
Able to be maintained at a certain rate or level (Energy type).
A stock or supply of money, materials, staff, and other assets that can be drawn on.
The way in which two or more people or things are connected.
The throwing back by a body or surface of light, heat, or sound without absorbing it.
A small stream.
Able to be maintained at a certain rate or level over time (Environmentally...).
The arrangement of and relations between the parts or elements of something complex.
The internal framework of bone, cartilage, or other rigid material inside the body.
Based on or characterized by the methods and principles of science.
A person who is travelling or visiting a place for pleasure.
The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
The degree or intensity of heat present in a substance or object.
Long-established or inherited (Style/Process).
An area of land under the jurisdiction of a ruler or state.
The sound that follows a flash of lightning.
Situated or occurring below the surface of the ground.
All existing matter and space considered as a whole.
Not habitually or commonly occurring or done.
Requiring immediate action or attention.
A person who uses or operates something.
Worth a great deal of money.
The quality or state of being different or diverse.
An instance of vibrating.
A person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task.
The amount of space that a substance or object occupies.
A cascade of water falling from a height.
A large building where raw materials or manufactured goods may be stored.
The state of the atmosphere at a place and time as regards heat, dryness, sunshine, wind, rain, etc.
Ready, eager, or prepared to do something.
To move your hand to say hello or goodbye.
Extremely beautiful and, typically, delicate (contiene X).
The state of being no longer in existence (contiene X).
To make someone feel very happy and excited (contiene X).
The quality of being outstanding or extremely good (contiene X).
A feeling of excited happiness (contiene X).
Something that happens once a year (contiene Y).
A place where kids can play outside (contiene Y).
The day before today (contiene Y).
Someone who lives near you (contiene Y).
A story told to children (contiene Y).
A person who is fanatically committed to a cause.
An area or region with a particular characteristic.
To be very surprised or shocked (contiene Z).
The act of frozen water falling (contiene Z). Buscamos: Blizzard.
A puzzle or difficult problem (contiene Z). Buscamos: Puzzling.
